name: Brainstorm Series: Treasure Chase
description:
This challenging thinking game goes to the next level. Take a trip to exotic places around the world and find extraordinary treasures of human history. More than 300

demanding puzzles on 16 different maps await you. Gaming pieces such as snakes, switches and ice stones

make Treasure Chase even trickier. With a freely rotatable playing area and the option of undoing your moves as often as you want, you will always have an overview of the current state of play.

Features

• 360 Demanding puzzles on 16 different maps
• The built in solution help will assist you in your treasure hunt
• DSi picture function
• Compete with a friend in an exciting multiplayer mode against the clock
